tool_description: Blockrates provides a simple JSON API for exchange (forex) rates. Data are tracked and blended algorithmically from multiple reliable sources, ensuring fair and unbiased consistency.
title: Blockrates

api_list.name: Latest Rates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blockrates.p.rapidapi.com/v1/rates"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockrates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
